name: The Cultural Protector
description:
Hello Protector !  Informations About Game : 

Sorry about the trailer :(((

- Name : The Cultural Protector 

 - Genre : Adventure - action -Exploring - Suspense . 

 - Game Size : 721MB

 - Developement Time : 2Days and 13H   

 Game Content : introducing our 3D exploration game that represents the monuments of algeria ( Makam al chahid - Beni hamad fort - The royal mausoeum of mauretania - the monument to the dead - Hamoud boualem ).In this game you will defend and protect these monuments from destroyers and you have to find the cultural items before the fire time .

      The Cultural Protector is developed by DT Corp team  

 DT CorpMembers : 

- Souhil Sid .

- Mahieddine Otsmane.

- Ibrahim Houari

System Requirements : 

Minimum : 

  • CPU: INTEL CORE I3 - 5005U
  • CPU SPEED: Info.
  • RAM: 8 GB.
  • OS: Windows 7 or later.
  • VIDEO CARD: INTEL HD GRAPHICS 5500 or similar.
  • PIXEL SHADER: 5.0.
  • VERTEX SHADER: 5.0.
  • SOUND CARD: Yes.
